definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Dug activists even disrupted what was to be a placid, respectful funeral for the fallen Moe.
sentences.chinese: 达格族激进分子甚至在莫的肃穆葬礼上挑起骚乱。

sentences.english: Gbagbo militants have set up barricades in pro-Ouattara neighborhoods.
sentences.chinese: 支持巴博的激进分子在亲瓦塔拉的社区设立了路障。

sentences.english: Mr. Maliki stressed that the government will never stop battling outlaws, criminals and militants.
sentences.chinese: 马利基强调，政府不会停止向罪犯及激进分子作斗争。

sentences.english: Also, antivaccine activists are far more powerful now.
sentences.chinese: 还有，现在反对疫苗接种的激进分子非常强大。

sentences.english: But we face a common threat from militants in the border region.
sentences.chinese: 但我们都面临来自边界地区的激进分子的共同威胁。

sentences.english: And meanwhile, the militants are taking full advantage.
sentences.chinese: 而与此同时，激进分子正在钻空子。

sentences.english: For several years her fellow activists evinced little interest.
sentences.chinese: 有几年，和她一道的激进分子对此并无兴趣。

sentences.english: Commanders say the aim it to crack down on militants and criminals.
sentences.chinese: 指挥官表示，他们的行动目的是追捕激进分子和罪犯。

sentences.english: We are activists who seek to change the system and the cycle of corruption.
sentences.chinese: 我们是寻求改变腐败的体系和机制的激进分子。

sentences.english: He never considered himself an activist.
sentences.chinese: 他从来不把自己看着是激进分子。

sentences.english: A assemble of suspected Muslim militants claimed responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 唯一疑为穆斯林激进分子的组织声称对此负责。

sentences.english: In central Java, meanwhile, a mob burned down Christian churches.
sentences.chinese: 同时，爪哇中部的一伙激进分子烧毁了不少基督教堂。

pinyin: Ku4 er3 de2 Gong1 ren2 dang3
chi2 bu4 tong2 zheng4 jian4 zhe3

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
